comments.comment: 2009 uddaya iwara wela 2014 dakwa me. abaditha viru. waru hitiye Lankaweda? A awrudu 5 aanduwak thibbe Nedda? One dosaropanayata  A palakayo adala Nedda.siwure hitiyata awanka bawak penen neha, mathiwarana kala seemawa setkarala me ayawa parata genawata,mahajanaya moda neha,2009/14 ugaye mulumaninma meka yata gahala ,A. ugayath  apita matak wenawa.oya vissramika  lokkoth,sivuru dharee pirisath me pirisa ge abaditha bawath nothaka pare rastiyau. karawanne hora desapaluwage kappamata yata wela. .hari warada the run ganda beri thirisannu.bodu gihi apitath ladjai.thirisan desapalanaya ath harala wadagath desa palana krama bhavitha karamu olugedi thibbata wadagath manussa adahas neha.atha pays aha kana nathi karan rata wenuwen  kapawunu mema viruwanwa haallu karanda epa.obalath,hora desa paluwoth  hinganno wela ,me ayawa thuwala wasayen yodagena, kathire hinga kanawa.kotuwe podi hamuduruwo niwaradi gaman maga pennuwa.in wahanseta garukala yuthuhui".
